function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Different materials used in previous biofiltration system and DBAF may result in different disease transmission and contamination risks","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to the difference in materials and microbial communities","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough testing and analysis of the microbial communities in the new system to ensure safety","Technologies":"Advanced microbial analysis and monitoring technologies","People":"Occupants and users of the building","Owner":"Building management and facility operators"},{"Description":"Higher face velocity in the current DBAF may lead to increased spread of airborne contaminants and pathogens","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to higher airflow velocity spreading contaminants further","Mitigation":"Install additional filtration stages and air handling units to reduce the spread of airborne contaminants","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, UV germicidal irradiation","People":"Occupants and users of the building","Owner":"Building management and facility operators"},{"Description":"Growing concern about energy consumption in buildings may lead to compromises in air quality and disease control measures","Impact":"Reduced investment in air quality and disease control measures to prioritize energy efficiency, leading to increased disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient measures without compromising on air quality and disease control, prioritize systems with integrated energy and air quality solutions","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems with integrated air quality monitoring and control","People":"Building designers, architects, and facility operators","Owner":"Building management and facility operators"}]}
